subject: Climate & Environment
title: Rewilding Europe
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Rewilding Europe.

hook.text: Europe lost its wolves, bears, and bison centuries ago. Now they are coming back.

buildup.text: Rewilding programs reintroduce native species and let natural processes take over again.

discovery.text: European bison were extinct in the wild by 1927. Breeding from 12 survivors rebuilt the population.

twist.text: Wolves have naturally recolonized Germany, France, and the Netherlands â€” no reintroduction needed.

climax.text: Rewilded areas show rapid biodiversity gains â€” proving nature recovers fast when given space.

punchline.text: Europe's wildest animals were never truly gone. They were just waiting.
